question: What are your business hours?
answer: We are open from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Friday.

question: Do you offer delivery?
answer: Yes, we offer free delivery on orders above $50.

question: What is your return policy?
answer: We accept returns for a full refund within 30 days of purchase with a valid receipt.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Currently, we only ship to addresses within the United States and Canada.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping usually takes 5-7 business days.

question: Can I track my order?
answer: Yes, you will receive a tracking number via email once your order has shipped.

question: Do you offer gift cards?
answer: Yes, digital gift cards are available for purchase on our website.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or by phone at (555) 123-4567.

question: Are your products eco-friendly?
answer: We are committed to sustainability. Our products are made with recycled materials and our packaging is compostable.

question: How do I apply for a job?
answer: Please send your resume and cover letter to jobs@example.com with the position you are applying for in the subject line.

question: Where is your store located?
answer: Our main store is located at 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA.

question: Do you have public restrooms?
answer: Yes, our restrooms are located near the back of the store.

question: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
answer: Yes, please fill out our wholesale inquiry form on our website to receive more information.

question: Is your store wheelchair accessible?
answer: Yes, our store is fully wheelchair accessible, with ramps and wide aisles.

question: Can I place a special order?
answer: We do not currently offer special orders, but we are always adding new products to our collection.

question: Do you have a loyalty program?
answer: Yes, our loyalty program rewards you with points for every purchase, which can be redeemed for discounts.

question: Do you offer student discounts?
answer: Yes, students with a valid student ID can receive a 10% discount on all purchases.

question: What is your privacy policy?
answer: Our privacy policy can be found on our website, detailing how we handle your personal information.

question: Do you have a newsletter?
answer: Yes, you can sign up for our newsletter on our website to receive updates and special offers.

question: Are your products made in the USA?
answer: Some of our products are made in the USA, while others are sourced globally. Check the product description for details.

question: How can I unsubscribe from your emails?
answer: You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the 'unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any of our emails.

question: What is the shelf life of your products?
answer: Most of our products have a shelf life of 12 months. Please check the 'best by' date on the packaging.

question: Can I cancel my order?
answer: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours of being placed. Please contact customer support immediately.

question: Do you have a store catalog?
answer: We do not have a printed catalog, but our full product line is available on our website.

question: What are your holiday hours?
answer: Our holiday hours vary. Please check our website or social media for the most up-to-date schedule.

question: Can I change my shipping address?
answer: Please contact customer support as soon as possible to see if your shipping address can be changed before the order ships.

question: Is my credit card information secure?
answer: Yes, our website uses SSL encryption to protect your payment information.

question: Do you offer workshops or classes?
answer: Yes, we periodically offer workshops. Please check our events calendar on the website for upcoming dates.

question: How do I get my name on your waitlist?
answer: To join the waitlist for a sold-out item, click the 'notify me when available' button on the product page.

question: What is your policy on exchanges?
answer: We offer exchanges for products of equal value within 30 days of purchase.

question: Are all products shown on the website available in-store?
answer: Our in-store inventory may differ from what is available online. Please call ahead to confirm.

question: Do you sell physical gift cards?
answer: We only offer digital gift cards at this time.

question: What is your refund processing time?
answer: Refunds are typically processed within 5-10 business days after we receive your returned item.

question: Can I buy a product with a gift card?
answer: Yes, you can use your digital gift card to make purchases on our website.

question: What is your phone number?
answer: You can call us at (555) 123-4567 for assistance.

question: Where can I leave a review?
answer: You can leave a review on our Google Business page or on the product pages of our website.

question: Can I pre-order upcoming products?
answer: Yes, pre-order options are available for select new releases. Check the product page for details.

question: Do you have a blog?
answer: Yes, our blog features articles on our products and industry news. You can find it on our website.

question: What are the ingredients in your products?
answer: Full ingredient lists are available on each product's page on our website.

question: Are your products nut-free?
answer: Our products may contain traces of nuts as they are produced in a facility that also handles nuts.

question: Do you offer product consultations?
answer: We offer free virtual consultations for product recommendations. You can book an appointment on our website.

question: What is your social media handle?
answer: You can find us on Instagram and Facebook at @exampleco.

question: Is shipping free?
answer: We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $75.

question: How do I report a bug on your website?
answer: Please email us at support@example.com with details and a screenshot of the issue.

question: Do you offer catering services?
answer: We do not currently offer catering, but we have partnerships with local caterers we can recommend.

question: What is the typical response time for emails?
answer: We aim to respond to all emails within 24 business hours.

question: Can I get a discount code?
answer: We send out exclusive discount codes to our newsletter subscribers. Sign up to get the best deals!

question: Are all your products handmade?
answer: Yes, all of our products are lovingly handmade in our local workshop.

question: What is your mission statement?
answer: Our mission is to create high-quality, sustainable products that bring joy to our customers.
